description.value:
Level 3 Transmutation

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: 30 feet

Components: V, S, M (a shaving of licorice root)

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target's Speed|XPHB is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to Armor Class|XPHB, it has Advantage|XPHB on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used to take only the Attack|XPHB (one attack only), Dash|XPHB, Disengage|XPHB, Hide|XPHB, or Utilize|XPHB action. When the spell ends, the target is Incapacitated|XPHB and has a Speed|XPHB of 0 until the end of its next turn, as a wave of lethargy washes over it.
